name: Muzzle Moths
description:
Your Goal:

Kill as many moths as you can while trying to become as powerful as you can, before you are ravaged by the hungry moths. But the thing is, these moths are attracted to the glow of your muzzle flash, so keep this in mind when challenging these groups of woeful opponents.

How to Play: Mouse & Keyboard

WASD - Move

Mouse to Look Around

Left Click - Shoot

R - Reload

Shoot Crates to open

Press E on a package (dropped by crate) to choose an upgrade.

Controller

Left Joystick - Move

Right Joystick to Look Around

Right Trigger - Shoot

Y Button - Reload

Shoot Crates to open

Press E (unfortunately on the keyboard) on a package to choose an upgrade.

Credits:

All assets, sounds, and code were made by me!

Notice:

At the time of submission the Replay and Main Menu feature do not function correctly, so to play again just refresh the page! Sorry for the inconvenience.
